name: ColorGuesser
0:
”Alexa, open color guesser”
”Alexa, start color guesser”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color guesser
des: Using your Smart Home Alexa, you can guess colors using only a begining letter. This is a fun game to play with your friends and family. There are over 65 different colors to guess! Good luck!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
